message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. I take 60%, you take 40%.  We can both enjoy this money now.
I think we should switch roles. I'll take 60%, and you can take 40%.  Let's see if you accept my proposal.
Bob, let's be realistic.  We both lose if this drags on.  I'll come down a bit to 55% - it's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
